org.kite.wire

Class WireBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • Binder
      • org.kite.wire.WireBinder

  • public class WireBinder
extends Binder
    Binder implementation that holds reference to enclosing WiredService.
    It also holds result queue of async method invocation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WireBinder(WiredService wiredService)
      Creates new WireBinder upon given WiredService instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResultQueue getResultQueue(Wire.ConnectionPair key)
      Return ResultQueue which async method results will be delivered to.
      WiredService getService()
      Return WiredService which this binder is associated with.
